sentences.en: Although he pretended to sympathize, he was laughing in his sleeve.
sentences.cn: 虽然他假装同情, 但他却在暗笑.

sentences.en: Bold as you please, she grabbed me by the sleeve.
sentences.cn: 她真够大胆的，竟抓住了我的衣袖。

sentences.en: He cleaned the flakes away with his coat sleeve.
sentences.cn: 他用大衣袖子把碎屑掸掉。

sentences.en: He plucked at her sleeve to try and get her attention.
sentences.cn: 他不停地拉她的袖子试图引起她的注意.

sentences.en: He pulled my sleeve, attracted my attention in this way.
sentences.cn: 他扯了扯我的衣袖以引起我的注意.

sentences.en: He used his sleeve to wipe the con-densation off the glass.
sentences.cn: 他用袖子擦掉玻璃上凝结的水珠。

sentences.en: he was new to the game but had a few tricks up his sleeve.
sentences.cn: 他虽不熟悉这项运动，却自有锦囊妙计。

sentences.en: he was new to the game but had a few tricks up his sleeve.
sentences.cn: 他虽不熟悉这项运动，却自有锦囊妙计。

sentences.en: He wondered what Shearson had up his sleeve.
sentences.cn: 他暗自猜度希尔森究竟有什么高招。

sentences.en: He wore a black band on the left sleeve of his jacket.
sentences.cn: 他在夹克衫的左袖上戴了一条黑箍儿。

sentences.en: His elbow poked out through his torn shirt sleeve.
sentences.cn: 他的胳膊从衬衫的破袖子中露了出来.

sentences.en: I still have a few tricks up my sleeve.
sentences.cn: 我还有几种手段藏而待用呢

sentences.en: Please don't touch these metal cables inside a plastic sleeve.
sentences.cn: 请不要碰那些套着塑料管的金属电缆.

sentences.en: She tugged at his sleeve to get his attention.
sentences.cn: 她拽了拽他的袖子引起他的注意。

sentences.en: The boy plucked at Adam's sleeve.
sentences.cn: 男孩轻轻地拽着亚当的袖子。

sentences.en: The friar preached against stealing and had a goose in his sleeve.
What have you got up [ in ] your sleeve Out with it!
sentences.cn: 你有什么 高招,快说说.

sentences.en: Will you please mend the sleeve of my blouse?
sentences.cn: 请你把我衬衣的袖子补一下好 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: 套筒，[机]套管；袖子，[服装]袖套

phrases.tran_cn: 套筒式滑阀；套阀；套筒阀
隐藏起来但准备使用的
作为锦囊妙计的；留作一手的

phrases.phrase: wear one's heart on one's sleeve

trans.tran_cn: [机]套筒，套管，袖子，袖套，唱片套
trans.tran_en: the part of a piece of clothing that covers all or part of your arm
